markdown:
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 44 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 42 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 39 [Jaiban](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1465) **Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 41 **Perception** +23; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet **Languages** **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +30, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +28, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +26 **Str** +9 **Dex** +4 **Con** +8 **Int** -4 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +1 --- **AC** 36 **Fort** +29 **Ref** +23 **Will** +25 **HP** 170 --- **Speed** 30 feet, swim 30 feet **Melee** jaws +31 ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d12+14 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18) **Melee** tail +31 ([reach 25 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d6+14 bludgeoning **Melee** foot +31 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d8+14 bludgeoning **[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=39)** Huge or smaller, foot, DC 36 **Quaking Stomp** ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per minute; **Effect** Jaiban stomps the ground with intense force. It creates a minor earthquake with the effects of the [_earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95) spell, except that the range is only 100 feet and is contained to a 20-foot burst. **Whip Tail** ([Sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) Jaiban cracks its tail, creating a sonic boom in a 5-foot burst centered on a corner within reach of its tail Strike. Each creature in the burst's area must attempt a DC 36 Fortitude save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature is [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).
**Failure** The creature is stunned 2.
**Critical Failure** The creature is stunned 3.
name: Jaiban

text: Jaiban Recall Knowledge - Beast (Arcana, Nature): DC 44 Unspecific Lore : DC 42 Specific Lore : DC 39 Jaiban Source Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island pg. 41 Perception +23; darkvision, scent (imprecise) 30 feet Languages Skills Athletics +30, Stealth +28, Survival +26 Str +9 Dex +4 Con +8 Int -4 Wis +3 Cha +1 --- AC 36 Fort +29 Ref +23 Will +25 HP 170 --- Speed 30 feet, swim 30 feet Melee Single Action jaws +31 (reach 20 feet), Damage 3d12+14 piercing plus Grab Melee Single Action tail +31 (reach 25 feet), Damage 3d6+14 bludgeoning Melee Single Action foot +31 (reach 15 feet), Damage 3d8+14 bludgeoning Trample Three Actions Huge or smaller, foot, DC 36 Quaking Stomp Single Action (Manipulate) Frequency once per minute; Effect Jaiban stomps the ground with intense force. It creates a minor earthquake with the effects of the earthquake spell, except that the range is only 100 feet and is contained to a 20-foot burst. Whip Tail Two Actions (Sonic) Jaiban cracks its tail, creating a sonic boom in a 5-foot burst centered on a corner within reach of its tail Strike. Each creature in the burst's area must attempt a DC 36 Fortitude save. Critical Success The creature is unaffected. Success The creature is stunned 1. Failure The creature is stunned 2. Critical Failure The creature is stunned 3.
